item.title: Folder action to autorename screenshots
item.description: Move the location of the screenshots I do not want to have ~/Desktop polluted with files. Thus 1 2 3 mkdir -p ~/Documents/Screenshots defaults write com.apple.screencapture location ~/Documents/Screenshots killall SystemUIServer Test the screenshot - it does it Automator based auto-rename Create Folder action for ~/Documents/Screenshots It has 3 actions 1 2 3 s/Screen Shots // s/./-/g s/ at /_/
